responses.trigger: tell me a fact about space
responses.reply: Space is completely silent because there is no air to carry sound.

responses.trigger: what is the speed of light
responses.reply: The speed of light is approximately 299,792 kilometers per second.
Gravity is a force that attracts objects towards the center of the Earth (or any other planet or star).

responses.trigger: tell me about the solar system
responses.reply: The solar system consists of the Sun, planets, moons, asteroids, and other celestial bodies.
A black hole is a region in space where the gravitational pull is so strong that not even light can escape.
Mount Everest is the tallest mountain on Earth, reaching 8,848 meters above sea level.
There are seven continents: Asia, Africa, North America, South America, Antarctica, Europe, and Australia.

responses.trigger: what is the capital of France
responses.reply: The capital of France is Paris.

responses.reply: The capital of Japan is Tokyo.

responses.trigger: how tall is the Eiffel Tower
responses.reply: The Eiffel Tower is 330 meters tall.
